resources.string:
Notes:
 If it doesn't work, you might want to try:
 - unplugging the device and plugging it in again
 - checking you didn't deny root access
 - adding an entry to the bug tracker at https://github.com/thejh/ImageExposer
 - sending me an e-mail at jannhorn@googlemail.com
 
 source code is at https://github.com/thejh/ImageExposer
